(Simplified: 颡)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 桑 indicates the sound; 頁 (head) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 桑 [ sāng ] mulberry tree; surname
    • 頁 [ yè ] page, sheet, leaf
①額，腦門兒：稽顙(古代一種跪拜禮，屈膝下拜，以額觸地。居喪、請罪、投降時行之)。
(Simplified: 颡)

顙字的基本解释

顙
sǎng
同“颡”。

顙字的汉语字典释义

[①]［sǎng］
［《廣韻》蘇朗切，上蕩，心。］
“颡1”的繁体字。
(1)额头。
(2)头。
(3)颊。
(4)叩头，稽颡。
(5)嗓子；喉咙。
(6)谓置物于喉中吹之。
(7)用同“搡”。猛推。

顙字的康熙字典解释

【戌集下】【頁字部】　顙； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1408第01
【唐韻】蘇朗切，桑上聲。【玉篇】額也。【易·說卦】震其於馬也爲的顙。【又】巽其於人也爲廣顙。【儀禮·士喪禮】主人哭拜稽顙。【註】頭觸地無容。【揚子·方言】?、頟、顏，顙也。　又【集韻】【韻會】?蘇郞切，音桑。義同。【易林】?鬣黑顙，東歸高鄕。【魏文帝·東巡觀兵詩】古公宅岐邑，實始翦殷商。孟獻營虎牢，鄭人懼稽顙。

考證：〔【揚子·方言】?頟頠顙也。〕　謹照原文頠改顏。

forehead
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［sǎng］
["Guangyun" Su Langche, swing, heart. ]
"颡1" in traditional characters.
(1) Forehead.
(2) Head.
(3) Cheeks.
(4) Kow on your head, jiye.
(5) The throat; the throat.
(6) It is said that the object is blown in the throat.
(7) Use the same "push". Shove.

【戌集下】【Page Department】　颡; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 1408 No. 01
[Tang Yun] Su Langqie, Sang Shangsheng. [Jade articles] Yeah. [Yi·Said Gua] Shake the Qi in the horse. [Also] Xunqi is also Guangqi. 【Rituals·Funeral】The master cries and worships Jiqi. [Note] The head touches the ground without capacity. 【Yangtze Dialect】?, Yun, Yan, and Yan.　[Ji Yun] [Yun Hui]? Su Yunqie, Yin Sang. The same meaning. [Yi Lin]? Hyena black 颡, east to Gaoyang. [Wei Wendi·Eastern Tour Watching Soldier Poems] The ancient mansion was Qiyi, and it was the beginning of Yin Shang. When Meng Xianying was in Hulao, the Zheng was afraid of siege.
